data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Landes
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Landes, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Landes, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Landes.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Landes, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Iu Mien people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, teach the church in the county of Landes to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Landes, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Landes, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
